name: Wrong Bet
description:
Zeus was betting with his friends when he made a mistake! He accidentally bet for a team which had no chance to win (BLUE), so he must try to destroy the enemy team (RED). Zeus' power is too strong, so be careful not to damage your own team.

The objective is to destroy all enemy karts. You will lose if your karts get destroyed though!

Controls

- WASD: Move camera

- Shift: Faster movement

- F/R/Mouse Wheel: Zoom

Weapons

- Oil Pool: Slow downs karts

- Mine: After being placed takes a few seconds to get ready. Once ready it explodes on contact with any kart

- HE Bomb: Takes some time to arrive. Heavy damage and a lot of pushing-power

- Healing Area: Heals any kart in the green area

- Turret: Follow a kart, it will attach itself to it. Once attached fires constantly for a few seconds

- Molotov: Takes some time to arrive. Relatively powerful area damage

Theme

The game combines Racing + God + Last Team Standing genres.

Made for Ludumdare Game Jam 41 in 3 days, using C++, SFML, Gimp, Audacity and FL Studio!
